org.vaadin.addons.sitekit.flow

Interface Flow

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFlowViewlet, CompanyFlowViewlet, CustomerFlowViewlet, GroupFlowViewlet, LoginFlowViewlet, UserFlowViewlet

    public interface Flow
    Flow allows creating hierarchy of of flowlets.
    Author:
    Tommi S.E. Laukkanen

        Adds a flowlet to this Flow.

        Gets flowlet for given flowlet class.
        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • forward

        <T extends Flowlet> T forward(Class<?> flowletClass)
        Goes forward to next flowlet of choice.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the flowlet type.
        Parameters:
        flowletClass - the class of the flowlet.
        Returns:
        the active flowlet after moving forward.

      • back

        Goes backward to previous flowlet.

        T - the flowlet type.
        Returns:
        the active flowlet after moving back.
